Name: Pirates Gold
About the game: Pirates Gold - This is a 2D platform game where you play as a young pirate who decided to take all the gold for himself. You are armed with bombs that you can throw at enemies, but the enemies are not so simple, they can kick your own bomb in your face, or blow out the fuse. The goal is to find all the chests with gold on the level, kill the captain and take the key to the door to the next level. 15 levels 3 types of enemies with different behavior stylish graphics and colorful music
